short_description: fastpath function to generate/store required set of values/parameters to be used by TD_RandomProjectionTransform for dimensionality reduction.
long_description: fastpath function to generate/store required set of values/parameters to be used by TD_RandomProjectionTransform for dimensionality reduction.

input_tables.name: InputTable
input_tables.rDescription: The relation that contains input data.
input_tables.description: The relation that contains input data.

output_tables.name: OutputTable
output_tables.rDescription: Specifies the name of the table in which the output of TD_RandomProjectionFit can be stored.
output_tables.description: Specifies the name of the table in which the output of TD_RandomProjectionFit can be stored.

argument_clauses.name: TargetColumns
argument_clauses.rDescription: Specifies the columns/features to be used for processing.
argument_clauses.description: Specifies the columns/features to be used for processing.

argument_clauses.name: NumComponents
argument_clauses.rDescription: Specifies the target dimension(number of features) into which data points from the original dimension will be projected.
argument_clauses.description: Specifies the target dimension(number of features) into which data points from the original dimension will be projected.

argument_clauses.name: Seed
argument_clauses.rDescription: Specify the random seed the function uses for repeatable results.
argument_clauses.description: Specify the random seed the function uses for repeatable results.

argument_clauses.name: Density
argument_clauses.rDescription: Specifies the approximate ratio of non-zero elements to be produced in the random projection matrix.
argument_clauses.description: Specifies the approximate ratio of non-zero elements to be produced in the random projection matrix.

argument_clauses.name: ProjectionMethod
argument_clauses.rDescription: Specifies the method name for RandomProjection algorithm.
argument_clauses.description: Specifies the method name for RandomProjection algorithm.

argument_clauses.name: OutputFeatureNamesPrefix
argument_clauses.rDescription: Specifies prefix to be used for output feature names generated by TD_RandomProjectionTransform.
argument_clauses.description: Specifies prefix to be used for output feature names generated by TD_RandomProjectionTransform.
